title: Pixel Watch bill of materials estimate can’t explain the sky-high price
description: Counterpoint Research says the Pixel Watch costs just $123 to build.

title: Developers of disabled third-party Twitter clients ask users to forgo refunds
description: Musk's Twitter abruptly shut off API access for third-party clients in January.

title: New Apple tool lets developers compare their apps to those of competitors
description: Comparative app metrics debut within App Store Connect.

title: Exotic bacteria species show promise as rare-earth element recyclers
description: Researchers think they’ve found the ideal bacteria to recover wasted elements.

title: Dealmaster: Save on Ring home security systems before features get paywalled
description: Secure your home with these Ring security system discounts.

title: Reddit tells court: Film studios spewed “nonsense” in demand for users’ names
description: First Amendment covers users who anonymously discussed piracy, Reddit tells court.

title: Waymo hit by second round of layoffs, has cut 8 percent of staff this year
description: Waymo says the cuts will let it “focus on commercial success.”

title: SBF tries to revise bail conditions after judge noted suspicious VPN use
description: A judge threatened to revoke his bail package entirely over online activity.

title: Musk’s bid to start Neuralink human trials denied by FDA in 2022, report says
description: FDA reportedly listed dozens of "deficiencies," including serious safety concerns.

title: Ford files patent for system that could remotely repossess a car
description: Ford says it has no plans to deploy such a system; it just files a lot of patents.

title: Why it’s time to get over your EV range anxiety
description: New research comes to some surprising conclusions that should put consumers’ minds at ease.

title: Here’s what Redwood learned in its first year of EV battery recycling
description: The company recycled 500,000 lbs of material from 1,268 EV battery packs.

title: Tesla’s underwhelming investor day fails to impress investors
description: Tesla fans expecting info about new models were sadly disappointed.

title: After flying four astronauts into orbit, SpaceX makes its 101st straight landing
description: "I just feel so lucky that I get to fly on this amazing machine."
